channel.title: Getting Java applets to run in
channel.description:
A WebBrowser MADE in Java? Im having trouble, Im making a runescape client made in Java, not C++, C#, C, Delphi, Pascal, or VB. In Java. But Im trying to get it to be sorta a webbrowser that will only open runescape webclient pages. I can get it to open the webpage, but the actual client will not load, only a white box with the Nav Bar on top.
SO is it possible to run a Java Applet in a Web Browser made in Java?

item.title: Getting Java applets to run in
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Of course it is.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting Java applets to run in
